Great Teacher Onizuka

グレート・ティーチャー・オニヅカ

Great Teacher Onizuka is an anime and manga series that follows the story of Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old former biker gang member who becomes a teacher at the Holy Forest Academy. Onizuka is not your typical teacher; he is crude, unorthodox, and has a penchant for mischief. However, beneath his rough exterior lies a genuine desire to help his students and make a positive impact on their lives throughout the series, Onizuka faces various challenges as he tackles the troubled students of Class 3-4, which is known for driving teachers away with their unruly behavior. Onizuka's unconventional teaching methods and unyielding dedication to his students often lead to hilarious and heartfelt moments as he attempts to break through their tough exteriors and inspire them to change.
